name: stockx_bulk_search
description: Search multiple queries on StockX in parallel.

detailSteps.code: const results = []; document.querySelectorAll('[data-testid="product-card"], [class*="ProductCard"], [class*="tile"] a').forEach((el, i) => { if (i < 10) { const nameEl = el.querySelector('p, [class*="name"], h3'); const priceEl = el.querySelector('[class*="price"], [class*="amount"]'); const imgEl = el.querySelector('img'); results.push({ name: nameEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', price: priceEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', image: imgEl?.src || '', url: el.href || el.querySelector('a')?.href || '' }); } }); const params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search); return { query: params.get('s') || '', result_count: results.length, results };
detailSteps.name: results
